title: Crime Alert 04.05.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 04.05.19
description:
Disgraced Pharma Bro Martin Shkreli uses an illegal cell phone at a country club prison – landing him in solitary confinement. Oklahoma zookeeper twice tries to hire a hitman to kill a rival wildlife sanctuary boss. Man chokes grocery bagger for crushing his chips.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
